posts.title: Why We Need to Doodle
posts.description: I’ve always been a big doodler. Every notebook that I kept from high school and college is filled with shapes, lines, swirls, dots…
posts.author: Erin Rhodes

posts.title: Learning to Become a Better Designer and Setting Guidelines for Myself
posts.description: My goal after BDW is to become a visual designer.
posts.author: Erin Rhodes
